name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the submod. Must be unique.

version.title: Version
version.description: A version number following the semantic versioning format (https: //semver.org/)

modules.title: Modules
modules.description: List of modules of this submod. Must be non-empty, all modules must exist, forwardslashes must be used instead of backslashes, paths must also not start with a slash, nor end in one, likewise it must not end in .rpy* or a slash

description.title: Description
description.description: A short description for the submod. Does not support interpolation.

dependencies.title: Dependencies
dependencies.description: Dictionary in the following structure: {'name': ('minimum_version', 'maximum_version')}corresponding to the needed submod name and version requiredNOTE: versions must be passed in the same way as the version property is done

settings_pane.title: Settings Pane
settings_pane.description: String referring to the screen used for the submod's settings

version_updates.title: Version Updates
version_updates.description: Dictionary of the format {'old_version_update_label_name': 'new_version_update_label_name'}NOTE: submods MUST use the format <author>_<name>_v<version> for update labels relating to their submodsNOTE: capital letters will be forced to lower and spaces will be replaced with underscoresNOTE: Update labels MUST accept a version parameter, defaulted to the version of the labelFor example:    author name: MonikaAfterStory,    submod name: Example Submod    submod vers: 1.2.3becomes:    label monikaafterstory_example_submod_v1_2_3(version='v1_2_3')

coauthors.title: Coauthors
coauthors.description: List of co-authors who helped work on this submod.

repository.title: Repository
repository.description: Link to the submod git repository

priority.title: Priority
priority.description: Submod loading priority. Must be within -999 and 999

required_os.description: Set of OS that are supported by the submod

blacklist_os.description: Set of OS that the submod does not support

Platform.title: Platform
Platform.description: Enum for representing OS platforms that are supported by MAS
